entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 18 except minus 12 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 18 except minus 12 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:21 PM CST Friday 17 March 2023
